column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday March 9 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Advisory for Clays Mill Rd at Lane Allen Rd/Rosemont Garden:
column4: Intersection partially shutdown due to a damaged electrical pole, lowered power lines and traffic signals following an earlier collision.

column3: Traffic Advisory for Clays Mill Rd at Lane Allen Rd/Rosemont Garden:
column4: Lane Allen Rd is shutdown between Mitchell Ave and Clays Mill Rd.
